name: Pixel Crossover
description:
You can play gamemodes on maps created by developer (Me) or even create your own!

Game Editor includes all things needed to create your own great maps and gamemodes to play alone or with Your friends! You can also customize your character with over 60 cool skins and a lot of cute pets, not counting those that will be added in new updates! :D

You can also join Pixel Crossover discord server to keep up with updates and make your own suggestions, that I will consider for sure!

If You have any problems our support (just me, i'm alone dev what do you expect) will be happy to help you!

Thank you for everything, I really appreciate you all :>
See Ya in the Pixel Crossover world!

~Dev
